text: Vinocherpiy otpravilsya k Yusufu i skazal yemu: "O Yusuf! O pravednik, kotoryy dorozhit istinoy i stremitsya k ney! Rastolkuy nam etot son: sem' tuchnykh korov, kotorykh poyedayut sem' toshchikh korov, i sem' zelonykh kolos'yev, i yeshcho sem' sukhikh. YA khochu vernut'sya k lyudyam, uznav tolkovaniye etogo sna. Mozhet byt', oni, ponyav yego znacheniye, otsenyat tvoi znaniya i priznayut tvoyo dostoinstvo
